T-004.title: Add allowlist for common false positives

T-005.title: Expand indicators list and rule tuning
T-005.notes: Expanded IoC list with 10 new C2 IP ranges (Raccoon v2, LummaC2, wave 3), 13 new C2 domains, 5 new malicious hashes, known typosquatted packages list. Added 7 new detection rules (SUPPLY-TYPOSQUAT, CRED-VAULT, NET-PROXY-TUNNEL, OBFUSC-CONCAT-BUILD, EXEC-WORKER-EVAL, RECON-SYSINFO, SUPPLY-PREPARE-SCRIPT). Tuned NET-NON-STANDARD-PORT to exclude common dev ports (5173, 4200, 9000, etc.). Added fileFilter to CRED-KUBECONFIG. 136 tests pass.

T-006.title: Add CI workflow (lint/test) and release checklist
T-006.notes:
Set up GitHub Actions CI with lint and test steps. Add release checklist.

**From AAHP NEXT_ACTIONS**
